name: 2022 IEEE Power and Energy Society General Meeting
content: Call for Papers for the 2022 IEEE Power and Energy Society General Meeting (PES GM) is now open! The 2022 meeting will be held 17-21 July 2022 in Denver, Colorado, USA. This premier power engineering conference, with the theme of Powering a Sustainable Future in a Changing World, will bring together practicing power engineers and academics from all over the world to promote, share, and discuss various issues and developments in the field of electrical power engineering. Topics of interest include but arenâ€™t restricted to, extreme events and their impact on power systems, energy sustainability, Artificial Intelligence in power systems, and the impact of power electronics on electrical infrastructure. Submit your papers by 10 November 2021 to be considered. Learn more about the submission process and paper guidelines here: https://pes-gm.org/call-for-papers/
